work.name: Institute for Information Security and Dependability, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT)
work.summary: I am currently a doctoral researcher at the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology. My research and teaching interests are in software engineering for classical and quantum systems.

work.name: Institute for Software Technology, German Aerospace Center (DLR)
work.position: Part time technical employee with focus on software engineering
work.summary: At the German Aerospace Center in Brunswick I was part of the software for Software for Space Systems and Interactive Visualization group and worked on the open source software VirtualSatellite software, focusing on the design and integration of a REST API.

work.name: Institute of Aerodynamics and Flow Technology, German Aerospace Center (DLR)
work.position: Dual study as information technology engineer
work.summary: I completed a dual study programme at the German Aerospace Center in Göttingen and the DHBW Mannheim. My research group investigated aircraft noise, in which I dealt with data handling and visualization.
